name: @influencehealth/elastic-particles
description: Building blocks for Elastic queries, filters, and aggregations which can be re-used, combed, and nested.
author: Thomas Beutler <tcbeutler@gmail.com> (https://github.com/tcbeutler)

scripts.docs: jsdoc2md --global-index-format grouped ./lib/elasticQuery.js > elasticQuery.md && jsdoc2md --global-index-format grouped ./lib/aggregations/*.js > aggregations.md && jsdoc2md --global-index-format grouped ./lib/filters/*.js > filters.md && jsdoc2md --global-index-format grouped ./lib/queries/*.js > queries.md
